name: refreshRconPasswords
description: Refreshes the "RCON" passwords of expired servers

name: refreshServerStatus
description: Refreshes status, players, current map and game version of all servers

name: updateGameServers
description: Compares the latest game version and updates all empty and outdated servers

name: refreshExpireDates
description: Retrieves the latest data from GameServers expire status service

name: refreshUpdatesFeed
description: Retrieves the "hlds_announce" feed to allow checking for game updates
